summary:
This adds lore friendly female and children giants to the various giant camps in
Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Giant Families
Author: Edhildil
04,07,2018
ver1


No more only male giants, it doesn't make sense that there are no female or children giants, where do they come from anyway?
Now there are families of giants with this mod. This adds lore friendly female and children giants to the various giant camps in

Skyrim. See screenshots.

No requirements except Skyrim.

You may use these assets for your mod, consider also a modders resource.

Tools used:
=======
Blender 2.49b
Gimp 2
Nifscope

Usage:
==========
If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description.
author: Edhildil
